overview: K-Pop Group ATEEZ drops a cinematic trailer to introduce their new chapter and new album.
tagline: WAKE UP WORLD. ARE YOU THERE? IT'S TIME. LIES CONTROL RULES NUMB HATRED EMPTINESS SELFISHNESS SURVEILLANCE REPRESSION CONTRADDICT BETRAY CRUELTY. ARE YOU SEEING THIS? EYES IN THE SKY.
title: ATEEZ(에이티즈) THE WORLD 'MOVEMENT' Film
